item.description: Hi, Long time no c....This is John, formerly of Africa Express...i'm now at central university college, i have been trying getting thru to u but to no avail. Did u make the rtip to Ghana as indicated on ur website? Bye
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
Long time no c….This is John, formerly of Africa Express…i’m now at central university college, i have been trying getting thru to u but to no avail. Did u make the rtip to Ghana as indicated on ur website?
Bye
